forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 55F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 54F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing late. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with the chance of some thunder in the morning, then skies turning partly cloudy late. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 56F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
